body_text: Nit: I'm pretty sure that in  this case the linter will let you use double quotes to avoid the \' escape. This doesn't need to block this PR though.
body: Nit: I'm pretty sure that in  this case the linter will let you use double quotes to avoid the `\'` escape. This doesn't need to block this PR though.
